script: Devi stands center-frame, looking at her reflection with a soft, flirty smile, wearing an elegant nightshirt in a clean studio background.
With a clean jump cut, Devi instantly transforms into a stunning high-fashion outfit that contrasts with the nightshirt, revealing an alternative style.
Devi slowly turns once to showcase both looks in the reflection, exuding playful confidence.
Devi strikes a confident pose, embodying the essence of luxury fashion.
Devi walks calmly out of the frame, leaving a lasting impression of elegance.
